00043 BOOLEAN     IsJumpableFencePresentAtGridno( INT16 sGridNo )
00044 {
00045       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
00046 
00047       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_OBSTACLE );
00048 
00049       if ( pStructure )
00050       {
00051             if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_FENCE && !(pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SPECIAL) )
00052             {
00053                   return( TRUE );
00054             }
00055             if ( pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour == MATERIAL_SANDBAG && StructureHeight( pStructure ) < 2 )
00056             {
00057                   return( TRUE );
00058             }
00059       }
00060 
00061       return( FALSE );
00062 }

00087 LEVELNODE *IsWallPresentAtGridno( INT16 sGridNo )
00088 {
00089       LEVELNODE *pNode = NULL;
00090       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
00091 
00092       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF );
00093 
00094       if ( pStructure != NULL )
00095       {
00096             pNode = FindLevelNodeBasedOnStructure( sGridNo, pStructure );
00097       }
00098 
00099       return( pNode );
00100 }

00102 LEVELNODE   *GetWallLevelNodeOfSameOrientationAtGridno( INT16 sGridNo, INT8 ubOrientation )
00103 {
00104       LEVELNODE *pNode = NULL;
00105       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
00106 
00107       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF );
00108 
00109       while ( pStructure != NULL )
00110       {
00111             // Check orientation
00112             if ( pStructure->ubWallOrientation == ubOrientation )
00113             {
00114                   pNode = FindLevelNodeBasedOnStructure( sGridNo, pStructure );
00115                   return( pNode );
00116             }
00117             pStructure = FindNextStructure( pStructure, STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF );
00118       }
00119 
00120       return( NULL );
00121 }

00124 LEVELNODE   *GetWallLevelNodeAndStructOfSameOrientationAtGridno( INT16 sGridNo, INT8 ubOrientation, STRUCTURE **ppStructure )
00125 {
00126       LEVELNODE *pNode = NULL;
00127       STRUCTURE * pStructure, * pBaseStructure;
00128 
00129       (*ppStructure) = NULL;
00130 
00131       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF );
00132 
00133       while ( pStructure != NULL )
00134       {
00135             // Check orientation
00136             if ( pStructure->ubWallOrientation == ubOrientation )
00137             {
00138                   pBaseStructure = FindBaseStructure( pStructure );
00139                   if (pBaseStructure)
00140                   {
00141                         pNode = FindLevelNodeBasedOnStructure( pBaseStructure->sGridNo, pBaseStructure );
00142                         (*ppStructure) = pBaseStructure;
00143                         return( pNode );
00144                   }
00145             }
00146             pStructure = FindNextStructure( pStructure, STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF );
00147       }
00148 
00149       return( NULL );
00150 }

00153 BOOLEAN IsDoorVisibleAtGridNo( INT16 sGridNo )
00154 {
00155       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
00156       INT16                   sNewGridNo;
00157 
00158       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
00159 
00160       if ( pStructure != NULL )
00161       {
00162             // Check around based on orientation
00163             switch( pStructure->ubWallOrientation )
00164             {
00165                   case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00166                   case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00167 
00168                         // Here, check north direction
00169                         sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( NORTH ) );
00170 
00171                         if ( IsRoofVisible2( sNewGridNo ) )
00172                         {
00173                               // OK, now check south, if true, she's not visible
00174                               sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( SOUTH ) );
00175 
00176                               if ( IsRoofVisible2( sNewGridNo ) )
00177                               {
00178                                     return( FALSE );
00179                               }
00180                         }
00181                         break;
00182 
00183                   case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00184                   case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00185 
00186                         // Here, check west direction
00187                         sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( WEST ) );
00188 
00189                         if ( IsRoofVisible2( sNewGridNo ) )
00190                         {
00191                               // OK, now check south, if true, she's not visible
00192                               sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( EAST ) );
00193 
00194                               if ( IsRoofVisible2( sNewGridNo ) )
00195                               {
00196                                     return( FALSE );
00197                               }
00198                         }
00199                         break;
00200 
00201             }
00202 
00203       }     
00204 
00205       // Return true here, even if she does not exist
00206       return( TRUE );
00207 }

00236 BOOLEAN IsHiddenStructureVisible( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usIndex )
00237 {
00238       // Check if it's a hidden struct and we have not revealed anything!
00239       if ( gTileDatabase[ usIndex ].uiFlags & HIDDEN_TILE )
00240       {
00241             if ( !(gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) && !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags&SHOW_ALL_MERCS) )
00242             {
00243                   // Return false
00244                   return( FALSE );
00245             }
00246       }
00247 
00248       return( TRUE );
00249 }

00252 BOOLEAN     WallExistsOfTopLeftOrientation( INT16 sGridNo )
00253 {
00254       // CJC: changing to search only for normal walls, July 16, 1998
00255       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
00256 
00257       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_WALL );
00258 
00259       while ( pStructure != NULL )
00260       {
00261             // Check orientation
00262             if ( pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_LEFT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT )
00263             {
00264                   return( TRUE );
00265             }
00266             
00267             pStructure = FindNextStructure( pStructure, STRUCTURE_WALL );
00268 
00269       }
00270 
00271       return( FALSE );
00272 }

00296 BOOLEAN WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopLeftOrientation( INT16 sGridNo )
00297 {
00298       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
00299 
00300       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF );
00301 
00302       while ( pStructure != NULL )
00303       {
00304             // skip it if it's an open door
00305             if ( ! ( ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR ) && ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN ) ) )
00306             {
00307                   // Check orientation
00308                   if ( pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_LEFT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT )
00309                   {
00310                         return( TRUE );
00311                   }
00312             }
00313             
00314             pStructure = FindNextStructure( pStructure, STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF );
00315 
00316       }
00317 
00318       return( FALSE );
00319 }

00346 BOOLEAN OpenRightOrientedDoorWithDoorOnRightOfEdgeExists( INT16 sGridNo )
00347 {
00348       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
00349 
00350       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
00351 
00352       while ( pStructure != NULL && (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN) )
00353       {
00354             // Check orientation
00355             if ( pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT )
00356             {
00357                   if ( (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_DOOR) || (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_DDOOR_RIGHT) )
00358                   {
00359                         return( TRUE );
00360                   }
00361             }
00362             
00363             pStructure = FindNextStructure( pStructure, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
00364 
00365       }
00366 
00367       return( FALSE );
00368 }

00394 STRUCTURE   * FindCuttableWireFenceAtGridNo( INT16 sGridNo )
00395 {
00396       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
00397 
00398       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_WIREFENCE );
00399       if (pStructure != NULL && pStructure->ubWallOrientation != NO_ORIENTATION && !(pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN) )
00400       {
00401             return( pStructure );
00402       }
00403       return( NULL );
00404 }
00405 
00406 BOOLEAN CutWireFence( INT16 sGridNo )
00407 {
00408       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
00409       
00410       pStructure = FindCuttableWireFenceAtGridNo( sGridNo );
00411       if (pStructure)
00412       {
00413             pStructure = SwapStructureForPartnerAndStoreChangeInMap( sGridNo, pStructure );
00414             if (pStructure)
00415             {
00416                   RecompileLocalMovementCosts( sGridNo );
00417                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00418                   return( TRUE );
00419             }
00420       }
00421       return( FALSE );
00422 }
00423 
00424 BOOLEAN IsCuttableWireFenceAtGridNo( INT16 sGridNo )
00425 {
00426       return( FindCuttableWireFenceAtGridNo( sGridNo ) != NULL );
00427 }

00430 BOOLEAN IsRepairableStructAtGridNo( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 *pubID )
00431 {
00432       UINT8 ubMerc;
00433 
00434       // OK, first look for a vehicle....
00435       ubMerc = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, 0 );
00436 
00437       if ( pubID != NULL )
00438       {
00439             (*pubID) = ubMerc;
00440       }
00441 
00442       if ( ubMerc != NOBODY )
00443       {
00444             if ( MercPtrs[ ubMerc ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
00445             {
00446                   return( 2 );
00447             }
00448       }
00449       // Then for over a robot....
00450 
00451       // then for SAM site....
00452       if ( DoesSAMExistHere( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, sGridNo ) )
00453       {
00454             return( 3 );
00455       }
00456 
00457 
00458       return( FALSE );
00459 }

00475       {

00480       }
00481       return( FALSE );
00482 }

00499 
00500 INT16 FindDoorAtGridNoOrAdjacent( INT16 sGridNo )
00501 {
00502       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
00503       STRUCTURE * pBaseStructure;
00504       INT16                   sTestGridNo;
00505 
00506       sTestGridNo = sGridNo;
00507       pStructure = FindStructure( sTestGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
00508       if (pStructure)
00509       {
00510             pBaseStructure = FindBaseStructure( pStructure );
00511             return( pBaseStructure->sGridNo );
00512       }
00513 
00514       sTestGridNo = sGridNo + DirectionInc( NORTH );
00515       pStructure = FindStructure( sTestGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
00516       if (pStructure)
00517       {
00518             pBaseStructure = FindBaseStructure( pStructure );
00519             return( pBaseStructure->sGridNo );
00520       }
00521 
00522       sTestGridNo = sGridNo + DirectionInc( WEST );
00523       pStructure = FindStructure( sTestGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
00524       if (pStructure)
00525       {
00526             pBaseStructure = FindBaseStructure( pStructure );
00527             return( pBaseStructure->sGridNo );
00528       }
00529 
00530       return( NOWHERE );
00531 }

00535 BOOLEAN IsCorpseAtGridNo( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubLevel )
00536 {
00537       if ( GetCorpseAtGridNo( sGridNo , ubLevel ) != NULL )
00538       {
00539             return( TRUE );
00540       }
00541       else
00542       {
00543             return( FALSE );
00544       }
00545 }

00547 
00548 BOOLEAN SetOpenableStructureToClosed( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubLevel )
00549 {
00550       STRUCTURE *       pStructure;
00551       STRUCTURE *       pNewStructure;
00552 
00553       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_OPENABLE );
00554       if ( !pStructure )
00555       {
00556             return( FALSE );
00557       }
00558 
00559       if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN )
00560       {
00561             pNewStructure = SwapStructureForPartner( sGridNo, pStructure );
00562             if ( pNewStructure != NULL)
00563             {
00564                   RecompileLocalMovementCosts( sGridNo );
00565                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00566             }
00567       }
00568       // else leave it as is!
00569       return( TRUE );
00570 }
